entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add AsStream extensions for memory and text-based types. #82801
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: IRandom interface (which System.Random and Cryptography.RandomNumberGenerator implement) #82799
  • MissingMethodException: set_Encoder on JsonSerializationOptions #82798
  • Support macOS to Windows OS cross-DAC #82796
    8.0.0
  • [8.0-preview2] error MSB4012: The expression "CompileListCount=@(_ReadyToRunCompileList->Count())" cannot be used in this context #82795
  • [Mono] Hot reload: Add support for editing members of generic types #82792
    8.0.0
  • [Mono] Hot Reload: Add support for updating generic methods #82791
    8.0.0
  • Create nuget package for WASI-SDK #82788
  • Create a user-friendly design for feature switches #82783
    8.0.0
  • [Test Failure] HttpClientHandlerTest_Http3.ReservedFrameType_Throws #82772
    8.0.0
  • QUIC failures on linux #82771
  • [TestFailure] Listener_BacklogLimitRefusesConnection_ParallelClients_ClientThrows_Slow fails on ARM #82769
    8.0.0
  • can system.text.json serialize a number property with a attribute to set number precision or digit length #82774
  • Idle application dies of OOM on Ubuntu 22.04 on .NET 7.0.2+ #82763
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: Regressions from peephole optimization of removing mov instruction #82776
  • Problem with debugging WASM #82777
    8.0.0
  • Code in CoreLib defeating resource string optimization #82759
    8.0.0
  • JIT: it is difficult to do flow analysis on inlinees #82755
    8.0.0
  • Fatal error. Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) in .NET 7 during GC #82753
  • `System.AccessViolationException` caused by combination of `AssemblyBuilder`, `GC.TryStartNoGCRegion`, and `GC.Collect` #82746
    8.0.0

Closed

  • SafeHandle marshalling broken with Mono #82308
  • profiler.multiple failing on MacOS 12.0 #64765
    8.0.0
  • What is the C# equivalent code for the Powershell sript to remove user from Adminstrators group? #82726
  • Unexpected ToString call upon adding item to dictionary #82784
  • System NuGet packages not up to date? #82770
  • ComInterfaceGenerator generates code with pointer type in generic #82504
    8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] CI failure in JIT.Methodical.eh tests run in Browser wasm Release AllSubsets_Mono_RuntimeTests #81388
  • [7.0] Test failure in JIT_HardwareIntrinsics._X86_Fma_Vector256_Fma_r_Fma_r_._X86_Fma_Vector256_Fma_r_Fma_r_sh() #82632
    7.0.x
  • [7.0] Test failure in JIT_HardwareIntrinsics._X86_Sse2_LoadLow_ro_LoadLow_ro_._X86_Sse2_LoadLow_ro_LoadLow_ro_sh() #82633
    7.0.x
  • support simple pattern matching, start with %2 to &1 #5844
    Future
  • .NET Core Path.GetFileName inconsistent with full framework #82760
  • Bogus `OperationCanceledException` raised by `StreamPipeReader` read methods #82594
  • `System.Net.Http.HttpClient` empty `Content.Headers.ContentLength` when using `AutomaticDecompression` #82737
  • System.Text.Json deserialization failure when published app is trimmed #82761
  • Library and Tools Subset build times regression (50+% increase) #82583
    8.0.0
  • Is it okay if I replace the current DebugProvider used by System.Diagnostics.Debug in my .NET Core application? #82758
  • Cast exception in ImmutableCollections.DoNotCallToImmutableCollectionOnAnImmutableCollectionValueAnalyzer on Preview 1 SDK #82741

PullRequests

Created

  • Use output size helpers for cryptographic primitives #82800
    area-System.Security
  • Implement load_assembly delegate for hosting API #82797
    area-Host
  • Add MemoryExtensions.AsSpan(string, Index/Range) #82794
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Fold unreachable cases for switch in importer. #82793
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • EventPipe lock implementation #82790
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Switch JsonReaderHelper.IndexOfQuoteOrAnyControlOrBackSlash to use IndexOfAnyValues #82789
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Fix ReservedFrameType_Throws #82787
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [mono] Move networking code to debugger component #82785
    area-Debugger-mono
  • disable SendFileGetsCanceledByDispose also on Catalyst #82782
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Updating the x64 casting behavior to be IEEE 754 compliant and to use saturation for overflow #82781
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [QUIC] Disable failing test on arm machines #82780
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [System.Net] Introduce CIDR IPNetwork #82779
    area-System.Net
  • JIT: Enable interlocked profiling for basic block counts too #82775
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add basic SIMD support to the jiterpreter #82773
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • update types mentioned in comment to match method #82768
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [browser] delete unused mono_wasm_* functions #82767
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Remove JTRUE(relop) invariant in the backend #82766
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SequenceReader performance; elide bounds checks and book-keeping by using ref-oriented approach #82765
    area-System.Memory
  • Unify Array enumerators between CoreCLR and NativeAOT #82751
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [JIT] X86/X64 - Eliminate redundant 'cmp' instructions #82750
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Introducing ValidateOptionsResultBuilder #82749
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Avoid unnecessary relinking when publishing a blazor project for AOT #82748
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Annotate Microsoft.CSharp library code for DynamicCode #82747
    area-Microsoft.CSharp, new-api-needs-documentation, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix SafeHandle debug-only _ctorStackTrace for mono #82376
  • Tweak IndexOfAnyValues.TryGetSingleRange #82786
  • [wasm] Implement partial backward branch support in the Jiterpreter #82756
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Do not use ALC name for AssemblyName #82754
    area-System.Reflection
  • Rewrite exception handler if retval is a pointer #82740
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [release/8.0-preview2] Versions.props: Increment package versions for 6.0, and 7.0 #82735
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Workloads
  • JIT: Revise DFS RPO computation #82752
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Preserve OCE.CancellationToken in StreamPipeReader #82745
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • [class] DIMs in the vtable of abstract classes may be overridden #82556
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Correct "abstact" to "abstract". #82738
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [browser] add test of download re-try into advanced sample #82722
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [jiterp] Remove write barrier from ldelem_ref #82757
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [mono][interp] Add instrinsics for common Vector128 operations #81782
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Stop incrementing class profile counter once the reservoir table is full #82723
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Trim managed debugging support code #82696
    linkable-framework, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add support for skipping workloads testing for previous versions #82742
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Workloads
  • Bump main PreReleaseVersionIteration to 3 #82658
    area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • CoreCLR support for InlineArrayAttribute. (struct layout part) #82744
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Refactoring store liveness update #80539
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Support raw ECDH key agreements #82551
    area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • JIT: Expand runtime lookups in a late phase #81635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Vectorize ProbabilisticMap.IndexOfAny #80963
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • update Alpine image #82660
  • update msquic #81742
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • [workloads] Upstream workload fixes from 7.0 #82069
    area-Workloads
  • Annotation changes only (part 3) #82697
  • [wasm] Add an internal GC lock API #82646
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono
  • [JIT] Fixed improper peephole zero-extension removal when cdq/cwde instructions are involved #82733
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement Test Process Watcher #78742
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use SecurityTransforms for RSA+PSS #82728
    area-System.Security, os-ios, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • Track down analyzer failure 2 #82734
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-codeflow
  • .NET 6: enable building on platforms where strict-prototypes is on by default. #82525
    community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] [browser] fix asset counting after download retry #82617
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.x
  • [mono][aot] Enable direct call transformation where caller requires no initialization #82711
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Share all "Compiles" tests from VTableIndexStubGenerator with ComInterfaceGenerator #82657
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Avx512 extract most significant bits #82731
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Initial support for zmm in .NET #80960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Use RegDeleteTree in RegistryKey.DeleteSubKeyTree #82598
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • [browser][icu][libraries] Load full ICU in library tests only when it's necessary #82619
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasi+browser] bundle timezones into .wasm #82250
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Initial emscripten 3.1.30 support #81215
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Create source generator for configuration binding #82179
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Try skipping generation of empty method dictionaries #82591
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use windows.vs2022.amd64.open for stress tests #82736
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [mono][jit] Emit a null check when storing to valuetype fields. #82663
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono] Raise soft RLIMIT_NOFILE on Linux #82429
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [draft][wasm] Smoke tests for node on runtime pipeline #78769
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Handle the remainder in MemoryExtensions.Count vectorized #82687
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Pass wasi invariant mode through env variable #82707
    arch-wasm
  • [wasi] Don't provision wasmtime on CI #82454
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-wasi
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add more type-forwarders for Xamarin.Android compatibility to mscorlib.dll #82618
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [IGNORE][wasi] Open PR to run *all* the tests #81649
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-wasi
  • [android][ios] Add LibraryBuilder task to support aot library mode #81919
    area-Infrastructure-mono
